statements.select: SELECT USER_ID , USER_NAME , LOGIN_ID , USE_YN , PWDCOMPARE(#LOGIN_PW#, LOGIN_PW) AS IS_PW_CHECK FROM UAA.USERS WHERE LOGIN_ID = #LOGIN_ID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO UAA.LOGIN_LOG ( USER_ID, LOGIN_ID, LOGIN_TIME ) VALUES ( #USER_ID#, #LOGIN_ID#, GETDATE() )
statements.update: UPDATE UAA.LOGIN_LOG SET LOGOUT_TIME = GETDATE() WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND MAC_ADDR = #MAC_ADDR# AND LOGOUT_TIME IS NULL
statements.select:
WITH MENULIST (MENU_ID, MENU_LEVEL, HIER_ID) AS ( SELECT AA.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , 1 AS MENU_LEVEL , CAST(CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ, AA.MENU_ID)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HIER_ID FROM UAA.MENUS AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND AA.PARENT_ID = ( SELECT CONVERT(INT, VALUE) FROM UAA.CODES WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE CODE = #MENU_GROUP# AND PARENT_CODE = 'MENU_GROUP')
UNION ALL SELECT AA.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , BB.MENU_LEVEL + 1 AS MENU_LEVEL , CAST(BB.HIER_ID+ '-' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ, AA.MENU_ID)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HIER_ID FROM UAA.MENUS AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MENULIST BB ON AA.PARENT_ID = BB.MENU_ID WHERE AA.USE_YN = 'Y' ) SELECT AA.MENU_ID , AA.PARENT_ID , AA.MENU_NAME , BB.MENU_LEVEL , BB.HIER_ID , AA.ASSEMBLY , AA.NAMESPACE , AA.INSTANCE , AA.FORM_TYPE , 'N' AS BOOKMARK_YN , ISNULL(( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UAA.MENUS BB WHERE BB.PARENT_ID = AA.MENU_ID), 0) AS CHILD_COUNT , ISNULL(UM.VIEW_YN,'N') AS VIEW_YN , ISNULL(UM.EDIT_YN,'N') AS EDIT_YN FROM UAA.MENUS AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MENULIST BB ON AA.MENU_ID = BB.MENU_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USER_MENUS UM ON AA.MENU_ID = UM.MENU_ID AND UM.USER_ID = #USER_ID# WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY BB.HIER_ID
SELECT AA.CODE AS CODE , AA.VALUE AS VALUE FROM UAA.CODES AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.PARENT_CODE = 'SYSTEM' AND AA.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY AA.CODE
SELECT AA.PHYSICAL_NAME AS NAME , AA.LOGICAL_NAME AS VALUE FROM UAA.DICTIONARIES AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.PHYSICAL_NAME IS NOT NULL ORDER BY AA.PHYSICAL_NAME
SELECT AA.CODE AS NAME , AA.VALUE AS VALUE FROM UAA.CODES AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.PARENT_CODE = 'MESSAGE' ORDER BY AA.CODE
